name: Two Cards from Deck
notes: Calculate the probability of drawing an ace on the first draw i.e.
column7: P(Ace on 1st draw) = Number of aces/Deck multiplied by the probability of drawing another ace P(Ace on 2nd draw) = Number of remaining aces/Remaining cards in deck.

name: Coin Flipping Game
notes: Geometric series. P[A] = sum_{k=1 3 5}^inf p x frac{1-p}{2}^{(k-1)/2}.
